title: EPISTOLA R. Heath
html:
EPISTOLA R. Heath

The sole inscription on a prominent notice in the middle of the N. Yorkshire moors: IT IS FORBIDDEN TO THROW STONES AT THIS NOTICE.

[R. Heath, Scarborough, England]
